TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TrackingDataItemValue extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Contains filter criteria for data extracted from a workflow instance in a .

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]
A TrackingDataItemValue specifies the value of a piece of data extracted from a workflow. It is used to constrain the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> in a query of the tracking data base used by a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>. You can add TrackingDataItemValue objects to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to specify that the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> be constrained to those possessing the specified set of extracted data.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The default constructor initializes <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue.DataValue%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue.FieldName%2A>, and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue.QualifiedName%2A> to a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic). You must set all of these properties in order to configure the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue>.

MemberSignature.Value: public TrackingDataItemValue (string qualifiedName, string fieldName, string dataValue);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string qualifiedName, string fieldName, string dataValue) cil managed

Docs.param: The qualified name of the activity from which the data was extracted.
The name of the member from which the data was extracted.
A representation of the value of the data.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class by using the specified qualified name of an activity, data field name, and representation of a data value.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue.QualifiedName%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue.FieldName%2A>, and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue.DataValue%2A> properties are set according to the values specified by the equivalent parameters to the constructor.
## Examples The following example demonstrates creating a new instance of a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> object. This example is from the Workflow Monitor SDK sample. For more information, see [Workflow Monitor Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2).
[!code-cs[WF_Samples#139](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/wf_snippets/snippets1.cs#139)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#139](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/wf_snippets/snippets1.vb#139)]

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a representation of the value of the extracted data.
Docs.value: A representation of the value of the extracted data. The default is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).

remarks.format:
## Remarks DataValue can be a null reference (`Nothing`).
## Examples The following example demonstrates setting the DataValue property. This example is from the Workflow Monitor SDK sample. For more information, see [Workflow Monitor Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2).
[!code-cs[WF_Samples#139](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/wf_snippets/snippets1.cs#139)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#139](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/wf_snippets/snippets1.vb#139)]

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the name of the activity member from which the data was extracted.
Docs.value: The name of the activity member from which the data was extracted. The default is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).

remarks.format:
## Remarks FieldName corresponds to the name specified in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem.FieldName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>. FieldName can, therefore, be set to specify an activity field or property; a member of an activity field or property; or a single element of an activity field or property (or a member of either) that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface. For more information see <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem.FieldName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingExtract.Member%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract.Member%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract.Member%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
## Examples The following example demonstrates setting the FieldName property. This example is from the Workflow Monitor SDK sample. For more information, see [Workflow Monitor Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2).
[!code-cs[WF_Samples#139](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/wf_snippets/snippets1.cs#139)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#139](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/wf_snippets/snippets1.vb#139)]

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the qualified name of the activity from which the data was extracted.
Docs.value: The qualified name of the activity from which the data was extracted. The default is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).

remarks.format:
## Remarks QualifiedName is equivalent to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.QualifiedName%2A> property of the activity from which the data was extracted.
## Examples The following example demonstrates setting the QualifiedName property. This example is from the Workflow Monitor SDK sample. For more information, see [Workflow Monitor Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2).
[!code-cs[WF_Samples#139](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/wf_snippets/snippets1.cs#139)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#139](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/wf_snippets/snippets1.vb#139)]
